did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Northcutt Ely Papers,

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: Stanford University. Libraries. Dept. of Special Collections and University Archives.

did.abstract: Correspondence, memoranda, research notes, rough drafts of reports, printed reports and pamphlets.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: Property rights reside with the repository. Literary rights reside with the creators of the documents or their heirs. To obtain permission to publish or reproduce, please contact the Public Services Librarian of the Dept. of Special Collections.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Northcutt Ely Papers. M0223. Dept. of Special Collections, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Gift of Northcutt Ely, 1971, 1973, 1980, 1982, and of his estate, 2002.

bioghist.head: Biography
bioghist.p: Legal representative of various interests in disputes over water projects on the Colorado and other rivers. Ely was Executive assistant to the Secretary of the Interior during the Hoover Administration.

scopecontent.head: Collection Scope and Content Summary
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, memoranda, research notes, rough drafts of reports, printed reports and pamphlets.

Collection is organized into four accessions originally treated as separate collections: M0223 (Series 1: Working files ; Series 2 : General files) ; M252 (Series 3 : Books ; Series 4 : Magazines; Series 5 : Pamphlets ; Series 6 : Reports ; Series 7 : Miscellaneous) ; M269 (Series 8 : Oil and Gas ; Series 9 : Water Irrigation ; Series 10 : Colorado River), M365, and accession 2002-112.

controlaccess.head: Access Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the library's online public access catalog.
controlaccess.subject: Water conservation -- United States.
Water use -- Taxation -- Law and legislation.
